revised_title: Rapid Changes in Gene Expression in Response to Microbial Elicitation
tldr: This article discusses the rapid changes in gene expression in plants in response to microbial elicitation, focusing on the French bean (Phaseolus vulgaris) interaction with the anthracnose fungus Colletotrichum lindemuthianum. The study highlights the induction of defense-related genes, including enzymes involved in phytoalexin synthesis, and the selectivity of enzyme induction and mRNA appearance in response to elicitors.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
